rows: Buyer contact or contact person of the buyer. The field is required.
Buyer account. Populated automatically by the account of the contact if the contact has an account specified. The field is required.
Deal name, for example, its reference code and customer. The field is required.
Potential revenue of the contract after the deal is closed. Populated automatically when you add products to the opportunity.
Date when you expect to close the deal.
Stage in the opportunity management process. Set to "Qualification," the first stage of the process, automatically. You can specify a different stage if needed.
Additional information about the opportunity. Enter any information about the opportunity that does not fit other fields.
The contact in charge of the opportunity. Populated with the current user contact automatically. The field is required.
html:
Field

Field value

Contact

Buyer contact or contact person of the buyer. The field is required.

Account

Buyer account. Populated automatically by the account of the contact if the contact has an account specified. The field is required.

Name

Deal name, for example, its reference code and customer. The field is required.

Total contract value

Potential revenue of the contract after the deal is closed. Populated automatically when you add products to the opportunity.

Expected close date

Date when you expect to close the deal.

Stage

Stage in the opportunity management process. Set to "Qualification," the first stage of the process, automatically. You can specify a different stage if needed.

Description

Additional information about the opportunity. Enter any information about the opportunity that does not fit other fields.

Owner

The contact in charge of the opportunity. Populated with the current user contact automatically. The field is required.
